task: Create a Background with a Dynamic Halo Effect
description: Develop a self-contained HTML snippet that implements a dynamic, interactive background halo effect similar to the Vanta.js Halo effect.
instructions: Implement the core background effect:
- Create a full-screen container (`position: fixed`, `top: 0`, `left: 0`, `width: 100vw`, `height: 100vh`, `z-index: 1`) to hold the effect.
- Use the Vanta.js library (specifically the HALO effect) to generate the dynamic background.
- The effect should be visually characterized by a glowing, particle-based halo, likely centered or following mouse/touch movements.
Configure the Vanta.js HALO effect with specific parameters:
- Enable `mouseControls`, `touchControls`, and disable `gyroControls`.
- Set `minHeight` and `minWidth` (e.g., 200.00).
- Define the `backgroundColor` (e.g., black `0x0`).
- Set the `baseColor` of the halo (e.g., a purple/violet like `0xa78bfa`).
- Adjust the `size` and `amplitudeFactor` parameters to match the visual density and movement intensity.
Ensure the background container is positioned correctly:
- Place it as a fixed background element, typically behind other page content.
- Use an appropriate `z-index` (e.g., `z-index: 1`) to ensure it renders behind foreground elements.
Include necessary external libraries:
- Link to the Three.js library (required by Vanta.js).
- Link to the Vanta.js library core.
- Link to the specific Vanta.js HALO effect script (`vanta.halo.min.js`).
Output Requirements:
- Provide a complete, valid HTML snippet.
- Include the HTML structure for the background container.
- Include the necessary `<script>` tags to load the required libraries (Three.js, Vanta.js core, Vanta.js HALO).
- Include an inline `<script>` tag to initialize the VANTA.HALO effect on the designated container element once the page loads.
- The output should demonstrate the active, dynamic halo background effect when viewed in a browser.
example_logic_summary: Create a fixed-position DIV to serve as the effect canvas.
Load Three.js, Vanta.js core, and Vanta.js HALO scripts.
Initialize VANTA.HALO on the container DIV using `VANTA.HALO({ el: '#container-id', ...options })` after the scripts load and the DOM is ready.
Configure options like `mouseControls: true`, `baseColor`, `backgroundColor`, `size`, etc., to achieve the desired visual style.
